languages.text: "Все, кто принял сторону Вультур и Стракса должны умереть. Они не заслужили ни милосердия, ни привилегии суда. Их казнь станет уроком для каждого, кто вздумает впредь покушаться на Вольного Торговца или манипулировать Лекс Империалис".

"Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Все, кто принял сторону Вультур и Стракса должны умереть. Они не заслужили ни милосердия, ни привилегии суда. Их казнь станет уроком для каждого, кто вздумает впредь покушаться на Вольного Торговца или манипулировать Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

"Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

"Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

"Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: "Wer mit Vultur und Strachs gemeinsame Sache gemacht hat, muss sterben. Sie verdienen weder Gnade, noch das Privileg einer Verhandlung. Ihre Exekution wird allen eine Lehre sein, die mit dem Gedanken spielen, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} zu ermorden und das Lex Imperia zu manipulieren."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Wer mit Vultur und Strachs gemeinsame Sache gemacht hat, muss sterben. Sie verdienen weder Gnade, noch das Privileg einer Verhandlung. Ihre Exekution wird allen eine Lehre sein, die mit dem Gedanken spielen, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} zu ermorden und das Lex Imperia zu manipulieren."

languages.text: « Tous ceux qui ont pris le parti de Vultur et Strachs doivent périr. Ils ne méritent ni la miséricorde ni le privilège d'un procès. Leur exécution servira d'exemple pour quiconque oserait à nouveau tenter d'assassiner un libre-marchand ou de détourner la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Tous ceux qui ont pris le parti de Vultur et Strachs doivent périr. Ils ne méritent ni la miséricorde ni le privilège d'un procès. Leur exécution servira d'exemple pour quiconque oserait à nouveau tenter d'assassiner un libre-marchand ou de détourner la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: “所有站在沃尔图尔和斯塔克斯那边的人都必须死。他们不配享有接受审判的特权，也不配得到宽恕。把这些人统统处决，所有妄图谋害行商浪人或扭曲帝国律法的人，都应该从这件事情中吸取教训。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “所有站在沃尔图尔和斯塔克斯那边的人都必须死。他们不配享有接受审判的特权，也不配得到宽恕。把这些人统统处决，所有妄图谋害行商浪人或扭曲帝国律法的人，都应该从这件事情中吸取教训。”

languages.text: «Todos cuantos han apoyado a Vultur y a Strachs deben morir. No merecen ni misericordia ni el privilegio de defenderse en un juicio. Su ejecución será una lección para todos los que piensen en asesinar a un Comerciante Independiente o manipular la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Todos cuantos han apoyado a Vultur y a Strachs deben morir. No merecen ni misericordia ni el privilegio de defenderse en un juicio. Su ejecución será una lección para todos los que piensen en asesinar a un Comerciante Independiente o manipular la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: 「ヴァルターとストラッチスに味方した者は、全員死ななければなりません。彼らには慈悲も、裁判を受ける権利もないのです。彼らの処刑は、再びローグトレーダーを暗殺しようとしたり、レックス・インペリアを操作しようとする者への教訓となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァルターとストラッチスに味方した者は、全員死ななければなりません。彼らには慈悲も、裁判を受ける権利もないのです。彼らの処刑は、再びローグトレーダーを暗殺しようとしたり、レックス・インペリアを操作しようとする者への教訓となるでしょう」

languages.text: "Vultur ve Strachs'tan taraf olmuş herkes idam edilmeli. Ne merhameti ne de adil yargılanmayı hak ediyorlar. Bir daha Hür Tacir'e suikast düzenlemeyi veya Lex İmperialis'in kelamını saptırmayı düşünen kimseler çıkarsa da bu idamlardan ders alsın."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who sided with Vultur and Strachs must die. They have earned neither mercy nor the privilege of a trial. Their execution will be a lesson to anyone who would ever again attempt to assassinate a Rogue Trader or manipulate the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Vultur ve Strachs'tan taraf olmuş herkes idam edilmeli. Ne merhameti ne de adil yargılanmayı hak ediyorlar. Bir daha Hür Tacir'e suikast düzenlemeyi veya Lex İmperialis'in kelâmını saptırmayı düşünen kimseler çıkarsa da bu idamlardan ders alsın.
